tasks.content: Backend software development through API for an e-commerce service primarily using Django, Jest, TypeScript, Redis, NestJS, ExpressJs, NodeJs, Docker.
Development of unit tests and clean code.
Development of backend solutions for frontend services availability.
Development of Full Stack web applications for the promotion of new services primarily using Sass, Jest, NextJs, ExpressJs, ReactJs, NodeJs, Docker, AWS Lambda, Laravel.
Development and maintenance of content management applications in the Retail service.
Integrations with traffic management systems such as Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics.
Backend software development through API for an e-commerce service primarily using Django, Jest, TypeScript, Redis, NestJS, ExpressJs, NodeJs, Docker.
Development of unit tests and clean code.
Development of backend solutions for frontend services availability.
Group information of the status of the telecommunications network, associating the necessary parameters of each equipment in MongoDB documents.
Generate reports of the current status of the network through remote connections to equipment such as routers, switches, network managers.
Creation of a reporting platform, with statistical graphs, processes in progress and equipment failures primarily using MongoDB, GitLab, Sass, NestJs, ExpressJs, ReactJs, NodeJs, Docker.
Development of platforms for the internal control of the entry of materials to the project primarily using Bootstrap, PostgreSQL, ExpressJs, NodeJs, Python.
Generation of reports on current logistics and comparative tables.
Generation of dashboards for project service estimation.

description.title: Datavision Landing Page
description.info: A Landing that offers data collection services to e-commerce businesses, also connected to Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager.

description.title: Pacuando Landing Page
description.info: A Landing that offers the possibility of scheduling personalized meetings for businesses with their clients.

description.title: Build a Library for Portfolios
description.info: A Component library to create your own portfolio without the need to be an expert, with customized information and design, ready to use and deploy.
description.stack: Typescript, ReactJs, Storybook, TypeScript, Sass, Jest

description.title: Technical Inspection Plants Search Engine
description.info: A Frontend and Backend app with a database, to search information about Technical Inspection Plants in Chile, filtered by communes, of great social use.
description.stack: Typescript, NodeJs, ReactJs, Express, MySql, Sass, Jest
